column4: what do I need to do if in my wireless it says firmware missing?
install the firmware
but how can i install it?
tell me your wireless card model
broadcom BCM94318MPAGH
BCM94318MPAGH are you sure?
thats what it says
where? did you check your lsusb and lspci
this is what it says Broadcom Mini PCI 802.11a/b/g BCM94318MPAGH
when I type lspci it says Broadcom corporation BCM4311 [Airforce 54g] 802.11a
is that what you were talking about?
yes, did you check under available drivers? in system ?
in additional drivers you mean?
yeah, you see it there?
no it didn't find any
can you paste us in here: http://www.n-iCe.pastebin.com/ your /etc/apt/sources.lists ?
can you paste us in here: http://www.n-iCe.pastebin.com/ your /etc/apt/sources.list ?
sudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list
change them to: http://www.n-ice.pastebin.com/wGMM3chR
are you there?
I have a Broadcom corporation BCM4311 Wireless card and it says firmware not installed, somebody could help me?
